data.name: All Songs Are From The King
data.detailed_description:
A game where Silent Hills meets Kahlil Gibran’s ‘The Prophet’.

"We are not human beings having a spiritual experience; we are spiritual beings having a human experience." - Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

Featuring images from renowned photographer Natalia Drepina and passages from the writings of the Baha'i Faith.

‘All Songs are from the King’ is a psychological horror game which explores the meaning of life, suffering and death through the poetry of T. S. Eliot, Rumi and other mystical authors. You will explore the environment and journey through other dimensions and realities, solving puzzles, finding notes and clues to cast light upon your experiences.
Virtual worlds bring into question the very nature of our own world, and ‘All Songs are from the King’ combines the virtual and textural to explore deeper questions about the meaning of our own subjective experience.

data.short_description: A game where Silent Hills meets Kahlil Gibran’s ‘The Prophet’.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.8 Ghz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB Dedicated Memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 3.2 Ghz Quad Core CPU or faster
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB Dedicated Memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible

content_descriptors.notes: Contains implied violence, blood and one instance of mild/blurred nudity.
